nodes.text: The Outer Core was an area of the galaxy located to the east of the mysterious patch of space known as the Unknown Regions.

In the new Star Wars canon the Outer Core was mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia. The term originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first used in the 2008 novel Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight, which was written by Michael Reaves.
